about_the_game:
The lives of some of the most notorious serial killers are in your hands. Are you capable of becoming a detective good enough to seek and find hidden objects and face Charles Manson? Engage in a one of a kind hidden mystery object game with crime investigation detective mystery elements and interrogate Richard Ramirez, John Wayne Gacy and their criminal peers. Hidden Object: Prison Diaries - a psychological criminal case detective game that really needs your keen eye 👀 and sharp judgment 🧠 to search and find all the hidden objects.

Here’s the Prison Diaries story. Crimes are already there, committed. You are the detective and everything depends on you. Solve hidden object mysteries, interview the killers and find the motives that drove them to commit numerous crimes. The information you gain in this psychological puzzle crime game is very valuable to the police in the upcoming cases. Are you capable of running this crime investigation? Do you have the stomach to handle this detective mystery hidden object game? Sit down and face Ted Bundy the best you can. Psychoanalyze him and really give your best in this search and find detective game. Play Hidden Object: Prison Diaries.

🔍HIDDEN OBJECT: PRISON DIARIES FEATURES:🔍

🕵️‍♂️ Play hidden object levels with a variety of mechanics
🕵🏻‍♀️ Interview the most notorious serial killers
🕵️‍♂️ Analyze and create their psychological profiles
🕵🏻‍♀️ Save your notes as transcripts, use them later on whenever you need them
🕵️‍♂️ Use various types of hints that reveal one or multiple objects
🕵🏻‍♀️ Brush - use as a hint that colors the object in the task bar
🕵️‍♂️ Timer - be faster than the countdown in solving the puzzles, otherwise you fail

Hidden Object: Prison Diaries, a psychological criminal case detective game that really keeps you on the edge of your seat. This is a call out to all those truly brave and smart detectives to engage in this unique hidden mystery detective game. Play Prison Diaries, a fresh cookie among hidden object criminal case detective games.

content_descriptors.notes: In Hidden Object: Prison Diaries, mature themes such as past violence, drug and alcohol abuse, and other sensitive topics are mentioned through dialogues but never graphically depicted. The game does not include visual representations of violence, sexual acts, or self-harm. These acts are not glorified or encouraged in any way. References to these topics are handled with care and sensitivity, ensuring a respectful and non-graphic presentation of the prison setting. Potential players with sensitivities to these themes should be aware of their presence in the storyline.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHZ
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or GPU with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.12+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or GPU with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

name: Hidden Object: Prison Diaries

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7 SP1+, 8, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHZ
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or GPU with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7 SP1+, 8, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or GPU with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Find all the hidden objects and deep dive into the psychology of murder cases!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
